comment: One way or another , history will surely be made tonight . Let it be the good kind . Please , please let it be the good kind .
amr:
# ::snt One way or another , history will surely be made tonight . Let it be the good kind . Please , please let it be the good kind .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / make-01
            :ARG1 (h / history)
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :dayperiod (n / night)
                  :mod (t / today))
            :ARG1-of (s / sure-02)
            :manner (o / or
                  :op1 (w / way
                        :mod (o2 / one))
                  :op2 (w2 / way
                        :mod (a / another))))
      :snt2 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (k / kind
                  :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                  :domain (ii / it)))
      :snt3 (l2 / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (k2 / kind
                  :domain ii
                  :ARG1-of g)))

comment: There is no good kind . Rotten outdated capitalism is going to continue making millions of Americans miserable whoever wins .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / kind
            :polarity -
            :ARG1-of (g / good-02))
      :snt2 (c / continue-01
            :ARG0 (c2 / capitalism
                  :ARG1-of (r / rot-01)
                  :mod (o / outdated))
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-02
                  :ARG0 (w / whoever
                        :ARG0-of (w2 / win-01))
                  :ARG1 (m3 / miserable
                        :domain (p / person
                              :mod (c3 / country
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "America"))
                              :quant (m4 / multiple
                                    :op1 1000000))))))
